item.description:
Both of these types are original, unique, independent, love new ideas and experiences and think out of the box. See what these types have in common and how they are different. Perfect for 4s and 5s, 4/5s, 5/4s and anyone interested in learning more about 4s and 5s.

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert. He has taught 2000 workshops on it, including trainings to organizations, churches, schools and companies. He is a therapist who works with individuals, couples and families with personality conflicts and does phone sessions to type people, help with relationships issues, self esteem, and decisionmaking. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager and Wollaston and West St.
item.name: Type 4 & 5 Workshop
